mapper.select: SELECT PRO_CODE , PRO_NAME , PRO_CATEGORY , PRO_BRAND , PRO_PRICE , PRO_INFO , PRO_AVAILABLE FROM API_PRODUCT WHERE 1=1 AND (#{pro_code} IS NULL OR PRO_CODE = #{pro_code})
mapper.update: MERGE INTO API_PRODUCT P USING (SELECT #{pro_code} AS PRO_CODE , #{pro_name} AS PRO_NAME , #{pro_category} AS PRO_CATEGORY , #{pro_brand} AS PRO_BRAND , #{pro_price} AS PRO_PRICE , #{pro_info} AS PRO_INFO , #{pro_available} AS PRO_AVAILABLE , SYSDATE AS REG_DATE , #{userId} AS REG_EMP , #{userIp} AS IP FROM DUAL ) T ON (P.PRO_CODE = T.PRO_CODE) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET P.PRO_NAME = T.PRO_NAME , P.PRO_CATEGORY = T.PRO_CATEGORY , P.PRO_BRAND = T.PRO_BRAND , P.PRO_PRICE = T.PRO_PRICE , P.PRO_INFO = T.PRO_INFO , P.PRO_AVAILABLE = T.PRO_AVAILABLE , P.REG_DATE = T.REG_DATE , P.REG_EMP = T.REG_EMP , P.IP = T.IP WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT (P.PRO_CODE , P.PRO_NAME , P.PRO_CATEGORY , P.PRO_BRAND , P.PRO_PRICE , P.PRO_INFO , P.PRO_AVAILABLE , P.REG_DATE , P.REG_EMP , P.IP ) VALUES (T.PRO_CODE , T.PRO_NAME , T.PRO_CATEGORY , T.PRO_BRAND , T.PRO_PRICE , T.PRO_INFO , T.PRO_AVAILABLE , T.REG_DATE , T.REG_EMP , T.IP )
